text: Friendship doubles joy and halves sorrow.
author: Maya Angelou

text: A true friend reaches for your hand and touches your heart.
author: Maya Angelou

text: Friends are the family we choose for ourselves.
author: Maya Angelou

text: Friendship is a door between two people.
author: Maya Angelou

text: Friendship is like a tree; it doesn't matter how tall it is, but how deep the roots are.
author: Maya Angelou
